class Data_IO.Data_IO(fname_config)[source]¶

write_gdf_to_file(gdf, fname='')[source]¶

Writes to File.

Parameters:
  • fname (str) – fname can be set in Data_IO.__init__.city.
  • gdf (geopandas.GeoDataFrame()) – Which values are written to file. File format is given by suffix.
write_to_sqlServer(table_name, df, dtype={})[source]¶

Writes to SQL-Database.

Parameters:
  • table_name (str) – name of table to write to
  • df (pandas.DataFrame()) – which values are written to table
  • dtype (dict, optional) – {col: type} type is of int, float, or geometry etc.
